div.p: Classroom Excellence for Real World Success

li.a: Title I Parent and Family Engagement Plan

li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current-menu-item page_item page-item-8812 current_page_item menu-item-8819

li.a: Title I Parent and Family Engagement Plan

li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current-menu-item page_item page-item-8812 current_page_item menu-item-8819

div.div: Clover Garden School will foster community, generate enthusiasm, challenge students academically, and produce successful citizens.

div.p: This is your centralized source for information in reference to COVID-19 and its impact on Clover Garden School.
At-Home Digital Learning Resources – This link takes you to a list of digital learning resources you and your child can use to stay sharp.
CGS – FAQ For Parents and Families – Please use this link to check out some commonly asked questions and answers due to COVID-19
Clover Garden Questions – Parents and Families – If you have questions not included in the FAQ for Parents and Families please use this link to submit your question.

p.em:
